where UWB (m 3 year −1) represents the volume of HWP (sawnwood, plywood) consumption in building construction, CFA (m 2 year −1) is the floor area of new construction, and UIW (m 3 m −2) is the wood usage volume per unit of floor area [ 40]. Further, t represents year, i represents the region of final HWP consumption (east, central, or west Japan), l represents produced from domestic forests, imported, and m represents wooden construction, non-wooden construction.
